item.title: How to debug an Angular application with Chrome and VS Code
item.description: In this blog post I want to show you how to debug an Angular application with Chrome and VS Code. First of all you need to install the extension in VS Code. You can find it here https://github.com/Microsoft/vscode-chrome-debug or search in the extensions tab for the plugin directly: After installing you probably have to enable the plugin and restart VS Code but in the end you will see your folder structure like normal.
